website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive model that doesn't produce remarkable sound but is an OK pick if you are more concerned about budget than top-tier acoustics.
pros: A basic speaker with a surprisingly solid build for a low price
cons: The sound has been described as "just OK" by some owners, and the bass could be deeper
Some reports of speaker failure within a few months of purchase

customer_reviews.title: I never installed the Monoprice in the wall due to the poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these, along with a pair of Monoprice Caliber and a pair of Micca to compare. The Monoprice were visibly more fragile with low quality parts. The carbon fiber cones were disapointing. I never installed the Monoprice in the wall due to the poor build quality. The Micca and Silver Ticket were comparable in sound quality after installing in the wall. I decided to keep the Silver Ticket pair and returned the other two pairs. To me, even if all 3 costed the same, I would still keep the Silver Ticket. Their build quality and part selection were noticeably better than Monoprice and a little better than the Micca. I'm an electrical/electronic engineer.
customer_reviews.author: howie nguyen

customer_reviews.title: superb center speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at First but don't be fooled by the low price! It's outstanding sound is superb to the big boys. I recommend this to anyone who is looking to start there surround sound system. I included a few pics of my final setup
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these speakers to install in my ceiling in order to upgrade my system to Dolby Atmos sound. These are now my height speakers. Apart from running more speaker wire through the ceiling, they were easy to install, and their sound blends right in with the rest of the system. I'm using a combination of B&H and Mirrage speakers, and these hold up along side them well. They are featured less frequently, as they are my height speakers, but when the soundtrack makes use of them, they sound convincing and definitely add to the immersion of the sound system. They arrived on time and packaged well, too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am putting 5 stars based upon the price vs performance. I doubt these sound as good as a more expensive version; however, it was the only in ceiling angled center speaker I could find that wasn't as much as I paid for my first car. So far they sound good. I really like the build quality and how flush it is with the ceiling; I truly do not notice it is there. Movie dialogue is very pronounced and easily understandable. I actually feel once I perform an automated setup of the speakers that the receiver will pull back on the center channel a little as the dialogue is on the loud side.
customer_reviews.author: PS_in_Idaho

customer_reviews.title: i was looking for an excuse to return it & get a better brand, but this speaker def won me over
customer_reviews.text: I tested this speaker out for a couple weeks before i even had it installed . i was looking for an excuse to return it & get a better brand, but this speaker def won me over. good sound, great price and can handle high volume. it ended up on the ceiling and they sound even better
customer_reviews.author: C Enrique

customer_reviews.title: They sound fantastic. Loud and clean with no distortion even at ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these 82ac speakers to mount in the ceiling as front left and right channels for my home theater build. As the build is in a pre finished basement, my screen wall was not usable for mounting speakers. These directional speakers work perfectly. They sound fantastic. Loud and clean with no distortion even at higher levels. The speakers have surprisingly heavy magnets. I've had them installed for just over a week and I've been living in my theater watching everything I can. You simply cannot get a better speaker at this price or even double. They definitely deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas E Faul

customer_reviews.title: I bought 8 of these speakers
customer_reviews.text: The title speaks for itself. I was initially attracted to the price, then the specs. I am using them as ATMOS speakers in tandem with my Definitive Technology Mythos nine and Mythos Gem XL speakers. I found the timbre to be very close. The fact that they are angled and have a db level switch built in, are a plus. I am still breaking them in, but I am very happy with the purchase because they sound great and are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: zanahue

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding in-wall surround speakers for the price; easy to install and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I was able easily install a pair of these 6.5" speakers as rear in-wall surround sound speakers in a 5.1 setup. The instructions were concise and easy to follow. Installation was straight forward for an average DIYer such as myself. The end result is a nice flush-mount speaker that blends into the wall (the grilles can be painted but the white color out of the box matched our walls well). Am an not an audiophile, but the sound is clean and pairs well with existing bookshelf B&W front speakers. For the price, these Silver Ticket speakers are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: PharmaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed all my Silver Ticket speakers (total of 9). I have a Dolby Atmos setup and it sounds amazing! Out of the 9 speakers I had one that was bad. I contacted Silver Ticket from their website. The speakers come with a warranty so was able to get a replacement after verifying another speaker worked in the same location. The verification was to make sure the issue wasn't with the wires. Once verifying the wires worked, Silver Ticket quickly responded and said they would ship out a replacement speaker. The Customer Service was very nice and quick to respond. Great company and product!
customer_reviews.author: lilibean22

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound/look for bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: I put 6 of these in our family room that has 14' vaulted ceilings. The sound is incredible. Acoustically, these are as good or better than the big name speakers and only a fraction of the cost. I gave the local home theater company the specifications of these speakers and asked them if they could price me out something they supplied that was similar. Their price for 6 similar speakers was $1500 installed. These cost $360 plus $275 to install ($635 total). Another difference was they only had 6" speakers whereas these are 8". This is a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: The Grim Meeper

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated at first, but now a smile
customer_reviews.text: I had overhand that had a old speaker in it. This fit that space. So I took the old out and started to install this. But the thickness of the stucco on the overhang was not thick enough for the speaker tabs to lock onto. SO I eventually made some shims out of drywall, and all worked well. What was nice is that from over tightening or loosening, none of the parts broke. If that had happened it would be a nightmare and I would be upset that its made so cheap...BUT, it wasn't!! This thing sounds pretty good actually. I wish I could pivot the tweeter, but otherwise, its nice.
customer_reviews.author: AfterhourshopTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Punch Way Above Their Weight
customer_reviews.text: Had these a year now, and am still just as pleased with the sound as when I installed them. I went with the center, two 8"s for the sides, and 6.5"s for the rears in a 7.1 configuration due to my room layout. I use Sony 6/6/3/tweets for main left and right, and a 10" powered sub. Integrated perfectly. Sound quality and features that punch way above their weight for the cost IMO. As long as they keep up with the quality, they should sell a lot of these. I would definitely recommend to anyone doing a home theater install from beginner to pro, and I've done my fair share.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Read this,  a review from a pro
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the price. It lacks in the 150hz to 250hz range mids are there but more treble than anything. As for clarity they are very clear. They do have an attenuator for 3 6 0db as well. Good material quality. Rear of speakers is caged to protect the cones. Also be sure you insulate the wall you install them in as with any in wall speaker or else your sound will be quite lacking and less responsive . It’s easier to move 1 cubic ft of air rather than 20. I approve get yourself one. I ordered the 5.25 center channel
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, love you can paint them
customer_reviews.text: These are really great speakers! We had our builder install them but he said no issues. Our builder also painted them to match our walls and the screen is painted to match our hardware and it looks really good! We wanted the surround sound and no wires but couldn’t spend an arm and a leg so after reading the reviews we decided to get them and got 4 of them for the living room and they sound great! Defiantly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Speaker terminal are janky and unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: I received a speaker with sketchy spring terminal connectors... I could not get a reliable connection no matter what I did. There could be a broken solder joint in the board or something but it was annoying to have it working one minute and if you just looked at it funny it would cut in and out. It works most of the time I have it out of the wall but the minute I put in the wall and start tightening the screws it will cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 5 of these in total after looking over several “big name” brands for a few weeks. I do not regret it one bit. These speakers are sturdy and sound crisp enough for my specific application. I plan to do something similar in another room down the road and will likely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: G Mane

customer_reviews.title: The 8" 82AC Speakers Sound Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have an angled ceiling with one speaker installed 10 Ft. above the floor and the other speaker installed 13 Ft. above the floor. I turned the speakers so that the angle would point straight down to each side of my couch. After years of buying Pioneer, JVC, Alpine, Pyle and Rockford Fosgate, I am happy to report that these sound absolutely fantastic when compared to those more expensive brands. I coudn't be happier with my decision!
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound
customer_reviews.text: So how to pick a speaker that sounds great while not breaking the bank, I love good sound and wanted to use built in speakers for a clean install, so I spent way to much time reading and searching and reading more, and more, I almost bought a much higher cost big name brand but decided to save $500 and try these for my setup, they were easy to install other than my blown in insulation- and they sound better than expected, I am setting up a projector home system and these speakers made it possible to upgrade my projector and still have excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have these installed without backer boxes and they have an attic with about 2 ft of blown in cotton insulation behind them. They sound great and have a nice precise sound. They are a little sparkly in the highs, but I am not sure that this isn't the cheap amplifier they are hooked up to. They have solid, clean bass and the installation is a snap. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kent

customer_reviews.title: speaker sound is very good, not great
customer_reviews.text: speaker sound is very good, not great. But the center speaker which I did not have in my system does make a considerable difference in the surround sound I'm looking for. The sound meshes god with the Energy speakers I have in the ceiling. It is a a good size unit to cut out, but the size is needed to accommodate the speaker set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cafiero

customer_reviews.title: These are very good speakers for their price
customer_reviews.text: These are very good speakers for their price. They easily install, look good and sound great. A ceiling mounted 7.1 system I have in a family room creates an amazing audio experience with these. I have also used this as a replacement speaker in an old cabinet speaker that contained a very simply paper cone speaker and the audio is noticeably improved. I know they aren't designed for that application but the old speaker mounting hole was just the right size for this and too tempting to try. The original cabinet speaker had just a capacitor between the 6in and 2in speakers whereas the 652C has an impressive looking circuit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Sound great.... really... these sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these for all of my listening areas. Indoors (home theater and Living Room) and outdoors under protected areas. I have been a Polk fan and helped a friend set up his home theater with all Polk equipment. I used these instead (saving hundreds) after reading the reviews. My system sounds fuller and with more presence than the Polk equivalent. I do use a Polk Sub to fill out the lows in the Theater system but these have really full range and are great by them selves. If you like high quality sound... these will be your solution.
customer_reviews.author: Renuer

customer_reviews.title: Best in wall speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can not find a better in wall speaker for the money. I have Polk audio speakers as well, they sound just as good. I hooked them up to a Dennon receiver with Polk audio ceiling speakers and a Polk audio subwoofer. Sound amazing, don't think twice if you're on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: matt leach

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are an amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are an amazing value for the price. Using in a High End Dolby Atmos system for rear speakers. They are well made and use high quality components along with a good corssover network. The quality is as good as speakers costing 4 times the price. The best thing is the customer service provided by the company. I sent them an email asking a question and they got back to me with the answer immediately. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Richard Westley

customer_reviews.title: At this price buy many....
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is freakin’ amazing!!! It has great sound quality. I put it out side in my ceiling under the covered Lani. I have a outdoor kitchen remodel in progress, and wanted to save some money on the outdoor speakers. This speaker blew me away. It looks well made and puts out great, great sound. Using it as my center channel and it is on point.
customer_reviews.author: Russ G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: 82AC 8" round angled speaker. Added these to the ceiling (rear surround) of a 7.2 surround family room with a Harman Kardon receiver. White blends in quite well to typical white ceiling paint- didn't need to paint to match. The receiver's auto EQ made drastic changes to this channel's settings to match the other ENERGY speakers in the system. Once it made the changes it sounds like an extremely natural addition to the soundstage and immerses us in the scene. Assuming the speaker lasts, I can't see spending 10x this on a similar speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Deans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are amazing!!!! They sound better than my in ceiling Yamaha speakers! I will be purchasing more of these for my surround sound in the basement. Very well packaged, comes with template and hook to remove screen. Highly recommend! Very well made! 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Berto M.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional. Exceptional sound. Exceptional value. I purchased and installed six 652C 6.5" in-ceiling speakers and one 5252W in-ceiling speaker. I set these up for 7.1 surround with Dolby Atmos. Very nice sound for my 24' x 14' den. Holes were cut with a multitool using the supplied templates. I built "enclosures" of R-19 fiberglas between the ceiling joists to dampen reflected sound, hooked everything up to my Denon receiver and now I'm good to go. A nice set of speakers for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Berdley

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound! Careful with shipping...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying these speakers. Installation was easy and came with good instructions. Shipping, however, was kind of odd. I purchased four at the same time yet two were shipped inside another box for protection while the other two were shipped individually in the OEM box! Luckily nothing happened to the speakers. Now, regarding the sound quality. It is amazing. I used these as surround sound speakers and the sound quality is perfect. I am so glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: The Angled Speakers are great. I replaced my Center Speaker in my movie theater room with this one. Before I replaced the center channel , the audio basically bounced off the floor, muffled my center speaker. Now, with the In-Ceiling Silver Ticket pivoting Speaker the Audio is literally in your Face :) They also sound pretty decent when combined with a good Home Theater amp ( I use a Pioneer Elite 7.2 Channel networked) If your looking for good quality sound, low cost and to be able to pivot the in-ceiling speakers towards you, then I recommend Silver Ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Nikos B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value with great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Like everybody else is saying, these speakers sound great. Both for the price and in general. No these are not audiophile quality speakers. But they sound about as good as most other name-brand speakers I've heard that are a factor or two more expensive than this. I have no idea how they pulled this off at this price (maybe its the lack of the nameplate?).
customer_reviews.author: Ben Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile but can determine clear high's and solid mid's these deliver. The circuity also appears to be overbuilt and "stout" in that it can handle the recommended wattage input. The templates were a big help in both installing and painting the grilles. Cant go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: B R

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good speaker at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I installed the 652C's in my kitchen ceiling. They sound pretty good after breaking them in. I have MIcca 8" in ceiling speakers in my basement, and i think they sound a little better than these 6.5", but they do cost more. I use them primarily for TV sounds and they work great for that. They have only OK bass if you are standing right beneath them. For music you would want a little more punch but they are so inexpensive that you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Engineer

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I set the bar low for these $34 a piece speakers.... I needed cheap in ceiling speakers for above the bed. My wife always complained that when the window ac was on she couldn't hear the tv and if we turned it up too loud it would wake the baby. So I paired these speakers with a Pyle 100w t class amp and I must say I'm impressed by the sound quality. People complained about the clips breaking and I had no such issue. I believe if you have some sort of competence in general house repairs this should be no problem for the average joe. I Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: James Orth

customer_reviews.title: really helps with dialogue on ceiling surround sound
customer_reviews.text: Due to the TV being on an exterior wall, there was no depth for wall speakers. The regular downward firing center speaker (with aimed tweeter) produced very low/muddled movie dialogue even after using my receivers equalizer to lift the voices. I was constantly increasing/decreasing the volume to hear the actors but not be blown out by explosions etc. the ability to angle them has really lifted the voices while keeping the other sounds in check. Additionally I like the extra boost of having two speakers in this unit. Easy to use template, simple since I was replacing a previously installed speaker.
customer_reviews.author: drmithra

customer_reviews.title: Great, great speakers, trust me.
customer_reviews.text: Read all the 5 star reviews and that is what you Have with these speakers. Can’t say anything bad about them. They are part of my bedroom surround system and they are amazing. You can’t turn them up to their limit but if you do you will be getting calls from your neighbors wanting to know where you bought them. Good listening
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for ceiling mounted speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these and the center channel dual 5 inch speakers for a new construction room I added to my house. I am running a 5.1 Yamaha home theater receiver to these and they are sweet. I did add a 10" Polk subwoofer to get more bass. So far very pleased, I can crank it up and make the walls shake.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speakers for home theater
customer_reviews.text: I know what you're thinking... There's no way that in-wall speakers this inexpensive sound good, and they can't possibly be great. But I can tell you after listening to these speakers for more than 6 months in a dedicated home theater that they sound fantastic! Very crisp highs and mid-range. No distortion at any volume. I have 6 of these speakers (2 front, 2 side, 2 rear) plus their center channel speaker running through a 7.1 Onkyo receiver with Onkyo subwoofer. Just amazing. I probably wouldn't have tried these speakers if I hadn't bought their fixed movie screen. I was so impressed with the construction and price I decided to give the speakers a try. Very glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The install was pretty straight forward
customer_reviews.text: I used 4 of these in my garage to jam music when worked on vehicles or just kicking back drinking beers. They are decent for the price. I really had to turn up the bass on my receiver just to get somewhat balanced sound out of them. The install was pretty straight forward, though, and they seem to be pretty sturdy. If I was buying again, I'd probably go with the Micca's.
customer_reviews.author: J. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and I appreciated the included template. I'm using this as a center channel speaker in my 5.1 surround installation. After several months of use I've been very happy with the quality of sound this produces.
customer_reviews.author: DIY User

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these speakers after reading many reviews on Amazon. I visited their website to learn more about their company and products. I am happy with these speakers. They sound great for mid range and high range. The speakers are well built and easy to install. The screws were sometimes little difficult to turn as they screw through the little plastic hold-downs but didn't give me too much trouble to install. Overall a great company and superb product.
customer_reviews.author: tinydots

customer_reviews.title: Worked good but failed.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was very good and easy to install in a wooden stand that I fabricated. The down side is it failed after about 6 or 7 months. Burst of high pitch static and died. I would tell anyone to spend a little more and get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done, read full specs
customer_reviews.text: Sound every bit as good as the 80$ speakers I bought 2 years ago. The magnet is very heavy. The frame install easily and holds snuggly to the ceiling. The grills install easily and can be painted, but the white finish is clean. Only issue I have is that these are 60 watt watt speakers not 120 watt as the title suggests. If you read the full specs you'll see that these have a max rating of 120watts. It does not matter for me, but it might for you.
customer_reviews.author: natt

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: Talk about exceeding your expectations, the quality for price I didn’t believe, the good reviews I was skeptical of. But was all true, installation a breeze ( besides having to get up in the attic 😀) and the sound quality is way better then the speaker I currently had. I’m definitely looking to get more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MGD

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these speakers. The 8" speaker has more base than I would have believed. Clear highs. I will be buying the center channel soon. I would definitely purchase these again and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ahab

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These are some great sounding speakers, really loud and have great highs, mids and lows. I installed 8 of these speakers throughout a house and worked marvelous. The little strips of tar were a really great detail for covering the connections, unfortunately they don’t tell you what they are for.
customer_reviews.author: Larryboy

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere if you care about sound
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with these. While they look very clean, the sound quality just isn’t there. Ended up returning my 2 and just buying 6x9 kicker speakers for my bar. Still look very clean flush mounted and sound 10x better. These sound fairly clear, but the power and deepness of sound is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these speakers. Just watched Star Wars and it was unbelievably awesome. I would have expected to get this sound to pay over $100.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick for Atmos
customer_reviews.text: I got four of these for my ceiling height speakers in a Dolby Atmos 11.2 system. A Denon 6300h (140wpc rms) drives them. They sound excellent for the purpose. I don’t run them full range (roll off the lowest stuff) but they perform as desired. Install was easy other than the obvious climbing in a small attic.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Like these speakers. For starters they were east to install. The plastic lip gives a good amount of room for error while cutting the hole. The mount works good to hold the unit in place. Speaker seems to be made of a plastic material that would resist moisture ( so it would work ok for outdoor use) Good size magnet, and they produce a good sound. very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Zarett

customer_reviews.title: budget ceiling speaker
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast and the sound quality is good. I spent around 15-20 min to install each speaker for a new construction which consider pretty fast The actual speaker is about 11” wide so buyer may need to keep that in mind when planning.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value, good sound, nice looking..
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, quality built, nice looking! Bought these for my parents; I have much more expensive in wall speakers. Now obviously these are not better, I will say they have some of the same sound characteristics as the ones I have, and for 1/10 of the price, I am pretty amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good dynamic range on these. Fuller sound than I expected. Only problem is that one speaker grille arrived dented. There's no easy way to fix it. Now I need to think about ordering another since the lighting in the room they're in clearly show the dents/bumps.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: These angled speakers are great surround sound speakers, easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers! The angle helps out the sound immensely when used as a surround sound speaker. I will say that I wasn't prepared for just how large these speakers are, but installation was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great for surroundsound.
customer_reviews.text: I installed 6 of these in my home theater ceiling and 2 in the rear wall. I also have high quality front speakers and 3 subwoofers. These did the trick and work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: John Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are amazing. My father in law and husband installed the entire surround sound in one day. They are easy to install and sound great, especially for the price. We did have one that did not work so I contacted the company directly. The replied immediately and sent me a replacement without hassle. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Katey M Wert

customer_reviews.title: Small price, huge sound.
customer_reviews.text: Don't need expensive to have great sound. I have these connect to a small 50wx2 two channel amp for my computer system. Sounds great, I think sounds better than the Bose computer speakers that I was replacing which died. Great product, well built, clean solder points, clean glue placement. I wasn't expecting such a well build speaker for the price. Definitely recommended, will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon V

customer_reviews.title: and boy these are great! I am using this as my center channel
customer_reviews.text: I just cannot believe the quality of sound that comes out of this and for the price, what a steal. I used $300 per speaker setup in my living room previously. I took a chance with this speaker for my theater based on the reviews, and boy these are great! I am using this as my center channel. Buy it , you will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas Y

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I saw a few reviews stating that the clips broke. I did not have any problems at all. I would recommend not using a power drill or power screwdriver as I can see how it might be easy to over tighten them and break them. I used a hand screwdriver and had no problems. I would by this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck...  Dolby Atmos on the cheap...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers for Atmos ceiling speakers. I tested these in full stereo mode on my receiver and they sound just as good as expensive speakers. These speakers easily sound better than speakers i've spent 3-4 times as much. Great buy. Look no further, these are your speakers.
customer_reviews.author: idrivesilly

customer_reviews.title: UPGRADED FROM 5.1 TO 7.1
customer_reviews.text: Using these for 7.1 system right now. I am using the 82AC as surround speakers and using my old surround speakers as the back speakers. They really fill out the room, my Denon translates 5.1 movies to 7.1, so this was a big quality upgrade, and very cost effective. I installed 4 speakers in anticipation of upgrading to ATMOS system. Thanks Silver Ticket!
customer_reviews.author: DMH2000

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Can't get a better speaker for the price. I picked up the center channel speaker for a 5.1 home theater system. I feel like the Silver Ticket speakers are comparable with the existing bose speakers that I have for the left/right and surround speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, and then some!
customer_reviews.text: You know the saying "you get what you paid for"? Well in this case I got more than I paid for, I bought this one and after installing bought 3 more and probably more to come. Paired with my Onkyo receiver this ONE speaker makes my man cave feel like I am in the theater! Whoever "Silver Ticket" is - They are one heck of a bang for $34 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Zion Ranch on YouTube

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, exactly as described, good quality for price, loud and superb, don't spend money on high speaker,trust me,they good,sound enthusiast
customer_reviews.author: Olin D

customer_reviews.title: These are really awesome speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome speakers for the price! I was really please with the precision molding of the plastic frame as well as the electronics in the crossover unit and the speaker itself. Mounting is a snap and they sound fantastic. This is the best surprise I've had in a long time. The high reviews this item has received are well-deserved and I'm happy I found these before spending hundreds more on a name brand (Polk) solution.
customer_reviews.author: James Rolph

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t have been easier to install. Looks great and sounds great. Make sure you use a stud finder before you cut into your wall obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: awesone, very happy
customer_reviews.text: sounds so good, very happy. using this for woofers in between sound bar and sub woofer. it's wired together with the subwoofer but puts out higher frequency bass than subwoofer. fills in the missing bass that the sound bar can't provide. I built a small cabinet, it was very easy with minimal wood.
customer_reviews.author: seabass

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to install at church in an entry area, good clear sound, seems durable. Note area is inside
customer_reviews.author: John P. Bush II

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality for less
customer_reviews.text: Just 2+ mos of limited use but I am very satisfied with these speakers. Solid state high quality speakers which rival much more expensive speakers. Wall or ceiling, these are perfect for your needs; unless you're still wedded to the towers. 5 stars easy
customer_reviews.author: Redbear

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers with incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers with incredible sound, replaced some Polk Audio speakers I had on tower stands. These sound just as good for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Gandjpike

customer_reviews.title: Thump thump
customer_reviews.text: No complaints Easy install, excellent sound, great surround sound features
customer_reviews.author: Monstarz

customer_reviews.title: Poor tinny and distant sound.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to the UK but arrived damaged. Packaging is good so must of happened during manufacture. Tested the speakers on existing system (Mission M3 Cube/Sony Str dn 1080) and the quality is poor at best. Very tinny and distant sound even when paired with Mission Subwoofer. Was hoping for more especially with the reviews I read on here! Now tasked with the expense of returning back to the US.
customer_reviews.author: P. Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, great sound for the price. This is my second set purchased for a small room surround setup.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Super bargain
customer_reviews.text: Wow, amazing sound from these inexpensive speakers. Very efficient, you get a lot of sound without pushing your receiver. Installation is the same as with most in-ceiling speakers, so it was easy. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gregor

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are awesome! I searched and searched for ceiling speakers and ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome! I searched and searched for ceiling speakers and got these ONLY based on the reviews! I just got them professionally installed in my home and they sound amazing. Even the installers were taken away at how great they sounded. One of the installers mentioned they sounded even better than Klipsch speakers that they have installed. They are Very reasonably priced and I love these so far! I will come back and add pictures of these, they sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Keiron & Niki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect surround sound
customer_reviews.text: I used the pair as overhead rear surround speakers and they sound great. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: and boy these are great! These are on par compared to lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I just cannot believe the quality of sound that comes out of this and for the price, what a steal. I used $300 per speaker setup in my living room previously. I took a chance with these speakers for my theater based on the reviews, and boy these are great! These are on par compared to lot of high end speakers. Buy them , you will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas Y

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be well made and they were easy to install. They sound decent. I'm using two of them in a cathedral ceiling over a wall-mount tv. Not the best sounding ceiling speakers I've used, but for the price, they're a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: jnetTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for price
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research while preparing to update our home theater. The reviews on these sold me and I am so glad I chose them. Our old speakers pointed straight down. The angled speakers project the sound so much better that we have the volume significantly lower than before. They were easy to install, I only had to make the opening bigger to accomodate them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dimberg

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought the speaker for my outside garage but when I received it, it was of such good quality that I am going to use it inside my house instead. Much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, but could have more bass
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad speaker for a kitchen. I would not use this in a HT setup though. Instructions are pretty minimal, no idea which channel is affected by the plus and minus switches on top. Also, I have not been able to aim the tweeter. Other than that it sounds pretty good. Crystal clear highs and decent mids.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: We use these as the rear speakers in our 7.1 system. They are excellent and I wish that they were put to more use than merely rear speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. White

customer_reviews.title: Dolby Atmos now complete !
customer_reviews.text: I made the decision to go 5.1.2 Dolby Atmos with 2 of these 6.5” ceiling speakers as my height speakers. Wow! They really fill in the surround sound. Dolby Atmos is incredible on Blu-ray or Netflix. Watching the Witcher and hearing all the environmental sounds with horses trotting around is so fun and immersive. They’re cheap and made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Man Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and look!  Crisp!
customer_reviews.text: Just replaces some small speakers in my ceiling in my bathroom. I will use there for surround sound in my basement remodeling next year these speakers for the price will compete with my mirage and klipsh for a great price I am a customer for life if they keep these great speakers at this great price point
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and they sound good.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a little while now and they work great. They're exposed to heat and humidity and they're still going strong. They sound good and loud enough for me. I'm going to purchase another one for my garage. I painted the grille to match the other attic vents around the house
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with speaker, especially for the price. Fits easily between 16 inch studs. Looks exactly like the in-wall Theater Solutions speakers I bought a year ago, probably made in the same factory in China. Together they make a nice 5.1 system. Bass is not bad but you will want a subwoofer for serious music or movie enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: tec

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Paired on a preliminar test with my excellent Klipsch Reference RS-41 II Bookshelf speakers and no noticeable difference in sound quality. Must behave great as ceiling speakers. Not magnetic grill and fixed tweeter are not relevant minus due the price. If budget is a factor, take it without fear.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Laranjeiras

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to install. They have been installed for a few weeks and are still working great. Haven't had any complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: jaxsdamax

customer_reviews.title: Too soon
customer_reviews.text: Give me a chance to get the damn thing installed, it arrived yesterday
customer_reviews.author: J Dischner

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers. I’m using as the center channel for home theater - could not be happy. The sound is awsome! Also my entire home audio is Silver Ticket speakers. Thay are better than the bose professionly installed system (sound better and handle power better) than in my last house.
customer_reviews.author: RFM

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Nice full sound range - clean, clear highs and strong tight bass. I'm using them as surround F&R - but plan to install them in more locations since it does an impressive job at all types of music as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these speakers after doing some research on reviews from other sizes speaker with the same manufacture. Installed them in my ceiling replacing my Boston Acoustics speakers, honestly you cant tell a difference. Very good sound quality also very well constructed speaker. I will be ordering the 8" in wall speakers here soon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, better price.
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally leave reviews, but I want to possibly help a hesitant consumer...These speakers are great for the fraction of the cost..Easy to install and look great. My wife was amazed at how quickly I put them up..If you are on the fence, give em a shot..I got 5 speakers that sound great for less than a pair of name brands cost.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Golden

customer_reviews.title: Good value in ceiling speaker
customer_reviews.text: Speakers install easily and sound good in this application as L/R rear surround speakers. Would recommend to others and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Avnett

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck when setting up dolby atmos.
customer_reviews.text: Included templates made for easy install. I wish speakers had come with wires, but no big deal. Very good sound quality for the money. I used a pair of them for dolby atmos set up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Houser

customer_reviews.title: These sound amazing! I am floored by the sound quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing! I am floored by the sound quality and volume from such inexpensive speakers. I was hesitant to buy at first due to the price but not anymore. I used the included paint shields and painted these flat black. You have to be careful not to put too thick of a coat on the grills or you can clog the holes.
customer_reviews.author: duke brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and the sound great. Used these for my side, back and height channels in Dolby Atmos. I could tell by the weight alone when I was putting them in that they were going to be good. The directional options are great. Really feel inside the scenes
customer_reviews.author: Michael Groom

customer_reviews.title: Punches above its weight.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker for the price. I had two satellite speakers, but was missing a center channel speaker for dialogue. This fixed that and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Almo

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased them for a new house which is being built. Ask me again in about 6 weeks and I’ll have answers.
customer_reviews.author: Joel T. Chelewski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were easy to install and sound just fine. I'm not a super audiophile, but the whole family loves having surround sound for our movies now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: 652W Silver Ticket in-Wall in-Ceiling Speaker with Pivoting Tweeter (6.5 Inch in-Wall)
product_meta.description:
Size:6.5 Inch in-wall

Thousands sold - the Silver Ticket 6.5 inch 80-Watt 2-Way In-Wall Speaker is a versatile speaker meant for anything from simple stereo applications to whole-home audio and theater systems. Suitable for 5.1, 6.1, and 7.1 home systems. The woofer cone is injection-mold mica polypropylene to ensure high-quality, long-lasting sound that will bring movie action and music vocals to life. The high-grade rubber edge allows for true audio accuracy and quality that will last. The 20mm silk dome tweeter pivots for micro-tuning of the sound placement. Included above and beyond competitors is the extra heavy weight, high-strength magnet with its field of energy perfectly tuned with the voice coil - it's all about true efficiency. What does this all mean? - It means you get an excellent speaker that is loud, but not noisy. The speaker will not sound harsh when turned up; it maintains excellent clarity at all volume levels.

This speaker is designed for quality and durability and can be easily installed either horizontally or vertically to fit your sound set-up. The accent trim around the edge of the speaker provides a clean appearance so you don't have to be a professional to install it. The flip-lever quick-mount system makes installing the speaker easy and secure. Each box also includes a wall hole cut-out template and paint masks.

SOLD INDIVIDUALLY, NOT AS A PAIR.
feature_bullets: One speaker 2-way in-wall with a 6.5" mica polypropylene cone woofer with rubber edge and a 16.5oz magnet delivers clear, distortion-free sound
The 20mm silk dome tweeter produces silky-smooth sound and 15-degree pivot for perfect sound placement
Frequency Response: 60 Hz - 20,000 Hz, Sensitivity: 88+/-2 dB, Impedance: 8 ohms, Crossover: 12dB per octave; Power Handling Capacity: 40-Watts Nominal, 80-Watts Peak
Solid constructed, moisture-resistant speakers can be used in bathrooms, saunas, or under outdoor eaves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars653 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
